title: With Arms Wide COVID, The Watergate of Pop-Tarts
itunes:title: With Arms Wide COVID, The Watergate of Pop-Tarts
description:
In episode 1016, Jack and Miles are joined by podcaster and journalist and Joelle Monique to discuss DeSantis welcoming Anti-vaxx cops to Florida, business owners still scratching their heads, confused why the old ways don’t work, does it even matter if Strawberry Pop Tarts aren’t filled with real strawberries? and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. DeSantis: Anti-vaxx cops WELCOME TO FLORIDA! 
  2. Business owners still scratching their heads, confused why the old ways don’t work
  3. Does it even matter if Strawberry Pop Tarts aren’t filled with real strawberries? 
  4. LISTEN: Rochelle Jordan - Already

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
